title: Understanding Measures
text: A measure is a calculation used in data analysis to summarize data. It is often used in tools like Power Pivot to perform calculations on data models.

title: Purpose of Measures
text: Measures are used to perform calculations on data, such as sums, averages, or other aggregations, to provide insights from the data.

hintAnswer: a calculated named field in Power Pivot
title: Identifying a Measure
text: Which of the following best describes a measure in Power Pivot?
choices: a calculated named field in Power Pivot
measures are a type of formatting for data analytics
